author: Springcode

changelog.release_notes:
1. Version 3.x firmware caused a bug where the connection to the the website no longer worked.  This is now fixed, apologies for the inconvenience this caused my users.
2. After a reminder is shown and 5 seconds has elapsed just flick your wrist to snooze it.

1. Added support for Pebble Round
2. Fixed bug where if a message is ignored after alerting no more reminders where fired.  Now if you ignore the alert it will auto-snooze after 1 min allowing other reminders to fire if required.
3. Added press and hold to the buttons when selecting dates and messages.
4. Supports latest firmware

**** PLEASE RECORD YOU CURRENT REMINDERS BEFORE UPDATING AS YOU MAY NEED TO RE-ENTER THEM ****

This latest version of RemindMe allows you to change the canned messages by registering with remindme.springcode.co.uk and follow the instructions.  This is not compulsory and you can continue using the App without having to register and continue to use the default messages.

Various small issues have also been resolved.

If the App crashes after you install it please uninstall and re-install it, this may be caused by an incompatibility with your older reminders, please accept our apologies for any inconvenience this may cause.

Added Quick Reminder to add a reminder N Hours and N Minutes from current time.

Add Spanish and French translations - please feel free to contact me with corrections!

Some minor bug fixes.
Tidied up layout and graphics on Time watches.
Fixed timezone issues with PebbleTime watches.  I can only test this on an emulator so please feedback any issues.
Fixed introduced bug for Daylight saving times, please check your reminders are the correct time.  Added About menu item with version number.
Fixed bug for Pebble Time where date always 01/01/70 HH:MM

description: This Pebble watch app allows you to set reminders on your watch without the need to access your phone. When it is time the reminder vibrates the watch, turns on the light and shows the reminder.

latest_release.release_notes:
1. Version 3.x firmware caused a bug where the connection to the the website no longer worked.  This is now fixed, apologies for the inconvenience this caused my users.
2. After a reminder is shown and 5 seconds has elapsed just flick your wrist to snooze it.

title: RemindMe
